sentences.sentence: I was incredibly hyper. I couldn't sleep.
sentences.translation: 我太亢奋了，根本无法入睡。

sentences.sentence: He is one of those lean, hyper-fit people.
sentences.translation: 他属于那种瘦削、过于健美的人。

sentences.sentence: I hated my father. He was hyper-critical and mean.
sentences.translation: 我讨厌我父亲。他吹毛求疵，刻薄无情。
